text: vony chekayut聞 anheliv prybuty yim, abo vash Lord, abo deyaki fizychni manifestatsiyi vashoho Lorda? Tse dnya vidbuvayet聞sya, niyaka dusha ne bude maty vyhodu z viryachoyi yakshcho tse ne vvazhalo pered shcho, ta ne zhalo vyhody viry v spravedlyve zhyttya. Skazhit聞, "Derzhat聞 na chekayuchomu; my nadto chekayemo
